column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////One of my friends told me to make sure to get the almond butter croissant. However
column2: by the time I got there (about 2pm on a Friday) they were all out. Boo hoo. So I ended up getting a chocolate chip cookie
column3: which was SO good. It was crunchy on the outside
column4: gooey on the inside and tasted like cookie heaven. It also had walnuts in it which I usually wouldn't be a fan of in a cookie
